name: Peashooter
description:
Peashooter is your first line of defense which shoots peas to attack zombies. 
Plant feature: green plant, pea family

name: Sunflower
description:
Sunflower is a primary plant which produces more sun for you. Plant as many of them as possible!
Sun production: Medium
Plant feature: yellow plant, infinite sun

name: Cherry Bomb
description: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.

name: Wall-nut
description: Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.

name: Potato Mine
description: Potato Mines explode on contact, but they take time to arm. Plant them ahead of zombies.

name: Snow Pea
description: Snow Pea acts like typical Peashooters, except Snow Pea has the ability to slow down or even freeze zombies entirely by firing frozen peas at them.

name: Chomper
description: Chomper is a Venus flytrap-like plant that is able to devour certain zombies, destroying them instantly.

name: Repeater
description: Repeater fires two peas at a time.

name: Puff-shroom
description: Puff-shrooms are usually the first mushroom the player obtains and are quite weak, though they are completely free in return.

name: Sun-shroom
description: He is a mushroom counterpart to Sunflower, being cheaper and producing sun, while growing in size depending on how long he's been on-screen, producing more sun in the process.

name: Fume-shroom
description: Fume-shroom is a mushroom which attacks zombies by firing strong fumes at them. In most games, fumes fired by Fume-shroom are able to pierce through multiple zombies, as well as through various zombie armor.

name: Grave Buster
usage: Single use, must be planted on graves
description: Grave Busters consume graves they're planted on.

name: Hypno-shroom
special: Makes a zombie fight for you
description: Hypno-shroom converts the zombie that eats him to the player's side, who then attacks any other zombies in the way. The zombie retains its current health, and in some cases, special abilities when converted. Zombies that do not eat plants cannot be converted by Hypno-shroom.

name: Scaredy-shroom
special: Stops shooting when enemy is close
description: Scaredy-shroom is a mushroom who attacks zombies at long range, but hides when they get too close.

name: Ice-shroom
description: Ice-shroom's abilities vary widely based on his appearances, but one thing that's been consistent between all of them is his ability to temporarily freeze zombies in place.

name: Doom-shroom
description: Doom-shroom is a mushroom plant who often serves as an explosive plant, exploding into a large mushroom cloud typically with an accompanying 'DOOM!!' onomatopoeia, dealing massive damage to all zombies within its range.

name: Lily Pad
description: Can also be planted under non-aquatic plants

name: Squash
description: Squash squashes zombies he spots, either a tile and a half ahead of him or behind him, dealing massive damage to all zombies on that tile, thus acting like an instant Potato Mine with better range.

name: Threepeater
description: Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.

name: Tangle Kelp
description: The few character descriptions of Tangle Kelp describe him as a difficult and foolish, albeit well educated individual with a particular fondness for philosophy and deception.

name: Jalapeno
description: Jalapeno is the fourth plant unlocked in the Pool area. He explodes in a lane, dealing massive damage to any zombies in his wake while negating the ice effects from Snow Pea, Ice-shroom, and Winter Melon on any zombies that survive his attack. Jalapeno can also melt away any Ice trails left by Zombonis and instantly destroy ice balls created by Dr. Zomboss's zombot.

name: Spikeweed
description: Spikeweeds destroy one rolling zombie and hurt any zombies that step on them.

name: Torchwood
description: Torchwood's main role is boosting the power of peashooting plants by lighting them on fire, increasing their damage output.

name: Tall-nut
description: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that block low flying zombies.

name: Sea-shroom
description: He performs almost identically to Puff-shroom, as he costs 0 sun and can shoot spores at zombies three tiles ahead of where he is planted, but has a slower recharge rate and can only be planted on water tiles in the Pool and Fog levels.

name: Plantern
description: He is an environment modifier who uses light to make the screen more visible, such as removing fog and revealing invisible zombies.

name: Cactus
description: She attacks by shooting spikes at zombies, being able to stretch herself to hit flying targets.

name: Blover
description: Blovers blow away all zombies in air

name: Split Pea
description: Split Peas shoot peas forward and backwards.

name: Starfruit
description: Starfruit attacks by projecting stars in five different directions whenever a zombie is in his line of fire: one to the left, one going up, one going down, one going to the upper right (gradient of 1/2), and the last going lower right (gradient of -1/2).

name: Pumpkin
description: He can be planted on other plants to provide an additional layer of protection.

name: Magnet-shroom
description: Magnet-shroom is a mushroom that takes away metallic objects such as buckets, pickaxes, equipment, or any metal object from zombies, lowering their toughness and/or preventing them from using their special abilities, while only having a small recharge time needed between thefts.

name: Cabbage-pult
description: Cabbage-pults hurl cabbages at the enemy.

name: Kernel-pult
description: Kernel-pult lobs weak corn kernels, but has a chance to fire butter instead, which stuns zombies. Like other pults, he can avoid zombie shields.

name: Flower Pot
description: Flower Pot is an environment modifiers who can be planted on roof tiles, allowing all non-flying plants to be planted on the Roof.

name: Coffe Bean
special: Can be planted over another plant. Wakes up mushrooms
description: Coffee Bean is a instant-use plant that are used to wake up other plants.

name: Garlic
description: Garlic is a defensive plant which not only absorb bites, but redirects zombies to the lanes above or below him.

name: Umbrella Leaf
special: Protect adjacent plants from bungess and catapults
description: SPROING! says Umbrella Leaf. Didjalike that? I can do it again. SPROING!Woo! That's me popping up to protectstuff around me. Yeah. Just like that. EXACTLY like that. Believe it

name: Marigold
description: Marigold is an alternate version of the Sunflower, producing Coins instead of Sun. Depending on whether the player is playing for the Plants or Zombies, Marigold will either reward the player with coins through cultivation as an ally, or through vanquish as an opponent.

name: Melon-pult
special: Melons damage nearby enemies on impact
description: Melon-pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.

name: Gatling Pea
description: Similar to Repeater, he is multiple Peashooters in one, in this case, four Peashooters, firing four peas at a time rather than just one.

name: Twin Sunflower
description: Twin Sunflower is a sun-producing plant, which, like their name suggests, produces twice as much sun as a normal Sunflower.

name: Gloom-shrom
description: Gloom-Shroom may look a little down, but they also look up, left, right, and diagonally. No matter what direction life goes, Gloom-Shroom always keeps the same expression.

name: Cattail
description: Cattail is an Aquatic plant that attacks zombies by firing homing spikes at the nearest zombie on the lawn.

name: Winter Melon
special: Melons damage and freeze nearby enemies on impact
description: Like Melon-pult, he lobs watermelons that deal massive damage to zombies, along with splash damage that can avoid zombie shields. Unlike Melon-pult however, his watermelons also chill zombies, making them slower.

name: Gold Magnet
description: Every five seconds, it collects up to five pieces of money on-screen, saving the player's time and allowing them to focus on attacking. It can attract both types of coins as well as diamonds.

name: Spikerock
description: Like Spikeweed, he is an area-of-effect plant that attacks zombies on the ground, being ignored by most zombies. Along with this, Spikerock is able to destroy specfic zombies at the cost of themselves.

name: Cobcanon
description: He is a massive ear of corn that resembles an artillery piece, firing corn cobs with extreme damage.
